title: The Miracle of Humpty Doo
brief_description: Describes the success of a rice-growing station in the Northern Territory. The venture, undertaken by the Australian-American Territory Rice Ltd is part of an overall plan to open up large areas of the Territory for the growing of rice, which will find a ready market in Asian countries.
